title: AI-Based Scientific Language Learning Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Preservice teachers simulate elementary science classes in a VR environment and participate in a process optimizing language expressions using AI tools

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct conversational expressions for elementary science classes with 80% accuracy using AI speech recognition technology
Learners can propose at least three strategies for transforming scientific terminology into learner-friendly language based on AI analysis reports
Learners can execute science class scenarios with over 90% engagement by incorporating AI feedback in a VR simulation environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
